originalTitle: Influential Ghanaian highlife musician Ebo Taylor dies at 90
title: Influential Ghanaian highlife musician Ebo Taylor dies at 90
content: The guitarist, composer and band leader fused Ghanaian music and funk to create tracks sampled around the world.

originalTitle: Ethiopia calls on Eritrea to pull its troops back to the border
title: Ethiopia calls on Eritrea to pull its troops back to the border
content: Eritrea has previously denied accusations that its soldiers are in Ethiopia supporting rebels.

originalTitle: Man named in South Africa's police corruption probe found dead
title: Man named in South Africa's police corruption probe found dead
content: Reports say Wiandre Pretorius, who last week said he survived an assassination attempt, shot himself.

originalTitle: Ethiopia demands Eritrea ‘immediately withdraw’ troops from its territory
title: Ethiopia demands Eritrea ‘immediately withdraw’ troops from its territory
content: In recent months, Addis Ababa has accused Eritrea of supporting rebel fighters on Ethiopian soil.

title: Italy’s Meloni condemns anti-Olympics protesters in Milan
content: Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni slams anti-Olympics protesters as 'enemies of Italy and Italians'.

originalTitle: Japan's governing party on course for landslide election win
title: Japan's governing party on course for landslide election win
content: A coalition led by current Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi is expected to clinch a decisive win, an exit poll suggests.

originalTitle: Thai PM claims election victory as early results show conservatives ahead
title: Thai PM claims election victory as early results show conservatives ahead
content: Thai voters are choosing between sweeping change or more of the same in an election called after several coalition governments collapsed.

originalTitle: Russia names three suspects in shooting of general
title: Russia names three suspects in shooting of general
content: The suspects include the alleged gunman, Lyubomir Korba, whom Russia says fled to the UAE after the attack.

originalTitle: Smith's versatility and 'contagious' positivity driving Arsenal
title: Olivia Smith: The Football Hero Making Arsenal Shine!
content:
Hello, amazing boys and girls of Africa! I'm your super-friendly news reporter, bringing you exciting stories from all over! Today, we have a fantastic football tale about a brilliant player who is helping her team become super strong again. Are you ready? Let's go!

Meet Olivia Smith: A Super Player!

Imagine you have a friend who is really, really good at playing games. They can run fast, jump high, and always know what to do. That's a bit like Olivia Smith! She is a wonderful football player. She plays for a famous team called Arsenal. They wear red and white uniforms, just like some of your favourite colours! Olivia is very talented, which means she is naturally great at playing football. She can kick the ball well, pass it perfectly, and help her team score goals. Did you know? Many amazing football players come from Africa! Like Mohamed Salah from Egypt or Sadio Mané from Senegal! They also use their talent to make their teams shine.

Playing Many Jobs on the Pitch!

Now, here's a super cool thing about Olivia: she is "versatile." That's a big word, but it just means she can play in many different places on the football field! Imagine you have a toy car that can turn into a plane and then into a boat. Olivia is a bit like that! One day she might be a striker, trying to score goals. Another day, she might be in the middle, helping her team keep the ball. And sometimes, she might even play closer to her own goal, helping to stop the other team from scoring. She is good at many, many things! This is very special because most players are super good at just one job. But Olivia can do many jobs for her team. This helps Arsenal a lot!

Helping Arsenal Get Strong Again

Sometimes, even the best teams can feel a bit sad or tired. It's like when your favourite game console isn't working properly, or your favourite toy car needs new batteries. Arsenal, Olivia's team, was feeling a bit "drifting." This means they weren't winning as many games as they usually do. They needed a big boost! That's where Olivia came in! Her amazing playing and happy spirit helped to "kick-start" them. Imagine giving a big, happy push to someone on a swing! Olivia's energy and great skills made everyone else on the team feel stronger and more hopeful. She helped them remember how fun it is to play and win together. Did you know? Even grown-ups sometimes need a little help or a friendly push to feel better and do their best!

Olivia's Happy Power!

Olivia also has something really special called "contagious positivity." What does that mean? It means her happiness and good spirit spread to everyone around her! Like when one person laughs, and soon everyone starts laughing too! Her smile and 'can-do' attitude make her teammates feel brave and excited. When Olivia is happy and tries her best, it helps her friends on the team feel happy and try their best too. It's like sunshine warming everyone up! This happy power is helping Arsenal play amazing football again. It shows that being a good player is not just about kicking the ball, but also about being a good friend and teammate.

Chasing Shiny Trophies!

Now that Arsenal is feeling strong and happy again, they are "chasing silverware." What is "silverware"? It's not forks and spoons! In football, "silverware" means trophies and shiny medals! These are special prizes that teams win when they are the best in a competition. Imagine winning a big, shiny cup for your sports day! That's what trophies are like for football teams. Arsenal wants to win these shiny trophies in "three fronts." This means they are playing in three different big competitions! Imagine you are running in three different races – a short race, a middle race, and a long race – and you want to win all of them! That's what Arsenal is trying to do. They want to be the champions in all three big tournaments they are playing in. Did you know? The biggest football trophy in the world is the FIFA World Cup! Teams from all over Africa try to win it too!

Why This Matters for Us!

So, what can we learn from Olivia Smith? We learn that trying your best, even when things are tough, is super important. We learn that being good at many things (versatile!) is a wonderful skill. And most importantly, we learn that being positive and happy can help everyone around you. When we are positive, we can make our friends and our teams stronger, just like Olivia does for Arsenal. So, next time you are playing football or any game with your friends, remember Olivia Smith. Play with a smile, try your best, and help your team shine! Keep cheering, keep playing, and keep smiling, amazing kids of Africa!
summary: Olivia Smith, a super talented and positive football player, is helping her team, Arsenal, play much better and try to win three big trophies.
whyMatters: This is important because it shows us that being talented, trying your best in many ways, and having a happy spirit can make a big difference for a team and help everyone succeed, just like Olivia is doing for Arsenal. It teaches us about teamwork and being positive.

title: How Ekitike has already become a Liverpool cult hero
content: Inside the rise of Hugo Ekitike, adapting to life in England, connecting with Florian Wirtz and why he's already a fan favourite.

originalTitle: Slot bemoans luck with referees in loss to Man City
title: Slot bemoans luck with referees in loss to Man City
content: Liverpool manager Arne Slot says the club have had poor luck with referees this season, believing that Marc Guehi should have been sent off for a challenge on Mohamed Salah in their loss to Manchester City.
